Rhinestone and sequin embellished bodice. Crepe skirt with back vent. ROFR-WD659. HL24-8155. Retrofete, launched in 2018 by co-founders Ohad Seroya and Aviad Klin, embodies the glamour and opulence of decades past. Having gained notoriety for its sequin-clad party frocks, the New York-based label has evolved into a collection of daring, top-to-toe designs that seamlessly transform from day to night. Regardless of where she goes, you can count on the Retrofete girl to bring the party.

products.name: Jacquard Column Gown
products.brandedName: Teri Jon by Rickie Freeman Jacquard Column Gown
products.description: Introducing the Teri Jon by Rickie Freeman Jacquard Column Gown, a stunning addition to your eveningwear collection. This exquisite gown showcases the flawless craftsmanship and timeless elegance associated with the esteemed brand, Teri Jon by Rickie Freeman.Immerse yourself in luxury as you slip into this regal Royal Blue gown. The captivating color and intricate pattern ensure all eyes will be on you as you make an entrance. Standing approximately 63 inches from shoulder to hem, this dress is designed to elongate your silhouette and flatter your figure.Our featured model, standing at 5'10', effortlessly showcases the beauty and versatility of this gown in a size 4. Please note that measurements may vary slightly by size to ensure the perfect fit for every woman.The attention to detail is unparalleled, with a draped and twisted neckline that adds a touch of drama and sophistication. The center back vent allows for ease of movement, ensuring you can dance the night away with grace and ease.Securing this elegant piece is a center back zipper with a convenient hook-and-eye closure, ensuring a seamless and secure fit. Crafted from 100% polyester, this gown boasts both comfort and durability for a dress that will withstand the test of time.To maintain its pristine condition, we recommend dry cleaning only. This imported dress is a testament to the brand's dedication to quality and attention to detail.Step into the spotlight and turn heads at your next special occasion wearing the Teri Jon by Rickie Freeman Jacquard Column Gown. With its ravishing design and meticulous craftsmanship, this gown is sure to make a lasting impression.
